page.title: 07A DAY IN A GUEST HOUSE
page.content: The day starts at about 7am. After washing and dressing Mum goes to the kitchen and gets breakfast started. Most people choose to eat between 8-9am. Breakfast consists of cereals, orange juice, tea, toast and marmalade. The cooked course is sausage, egg, bacon, tomatoes and fried bread. After everybody has finished their breakfast its time for the washing up and clearing up the kitchen. Next the bedrooms have to be done, stripping and remaking the beds that have been vacated and just making the beds of those who are staying. Polishing and hoovering is done in every room and when the house-work is finished Mum goes to the nearby caterers cash and carry for the shopping she needs. Then its back home to see to the washing and ironing.
